summary.p: Converts a given value to a .

examples.p: The following shows TO_DATETIME results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_DATETIME result of value ''1967-12-31'' is: ' AS Input, TO_DATETIME('1967-12-31') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_DATETIME result of value ''12/31/1967'' is: ' AS Input, TO_DATETIME('12/31/1967') AS Value
examples.note: Though TO_DATETIME uses an invariant culture to parse the string as date and time the output of this query may vary depending on your regional settings.
